full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Snow Blowers Spare Parts

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for various spare parts for snow blowers. The delivery of these parts is expected at two locations: 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec, and 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta, within 180 days of contract award.

#### Items and Quantities

The tender invites suppliers to submit bids for the following items:

1. Leaf Spring Support (250 units)
2.  Shackle for Leaf Spring Assembly (16 units)
3. Control Wheel for Hand Wheel Tiller Rudder (4 units)
4. Left-Sliding Window (12 units)
5. Hydraulic Brake Master Cylinder (6 units)
6. Direct Action Shock Absorber (16 units)
7. Drag Link Joint (12 units)
8. Differential Cover (4 units)
9. Sliding Pin (4 units)
10. Breather Complete (16 units)
11. Transfer Case Mount Bushing (12 units)
12. Leaf Springs (Front & Rear) (6 units)
13. Hydraulic Brake Master Cylinder (6 units)
14. Seal for Right & Left Front Articulation Joint (20 units)
15. 2-Speed Bach Gearbox (2 units)
16. 2-Speed Bach Gearbox (2 units)

Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name, model, and/or part number and the NSCM/CAGE code they are offering.

#### Tender Submission

Only electronic submissions of bids via email will be accepted. Bidders should email their bids to Marie-Claude Théorêt at marie-claude.theoret@forces.gc.ca.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The selection criteria for this tender are based on the lowest price.

#### Amendment History

This tender has been amended three times to provide clarification and answers to questions from potential suppliers, modify sections, and add clauses.

#### Documents

The tender documentation, including the solicitation package and amendments, can be accessed on the CanadaBUsy website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/.

#### Contact Information

Marie-Claude Théorêt, Contracting Authority
Department of National Defence
marie-claude.theoret@forces.gc.ca
 Phone: [Not Provided]
Fax: [Not Provided]  <!--(Please note that the contact information - phone and fax - was not provided -->.
